channel.title: Newby Alert!
channel.description:
ok lets get to buisness...lets start off with no flaming or ranting about noobs, if you can help, help, if you wanna abuse someone please dont abuse me, i may be a noob....but everyone is at some pont.. :D....
1.Would you say private servers are dificult to build/maintain 2.Isnt letting trafic into your pc dangerous? 3.Is there any known destination of a pictured tutorial of private server building? 4.Has anyone got any rough PC minimum specs? 5.Has anyone got any screenshots of server building to send me? 6.Any other help with probelms i may face when attempting my build
I hope to start building my server on sunday.....im researching the idea first, as i knw too well that rushing into stuff like this can be annoying from lack of knowledge! plz help :)

item.description:
@system wrote:

i gotta admite im a noob at building my runescapr private server but im working on putting my npcs right now need any help on how to add health or put npcs or putting drops on ground email me imp at blitz_21491@yahoo.com.maybe we could help eachother ,i still have no clue on what to do,but im learing and im only in 9th grade

item.title: Newby Alert!
item.dc:creator: @imp imp
item.description:
@imp wrote:

sweet, thanks for the javascript thing, my frinds are no help then i have the recomendeds doubled…so no problem their, hmmmm…im stil really confused tho, it looks so complex, like i sed, im doing it till im 99% sure of what the fuck im doing

[mod] still accepting hlp btw ;)[br][size=1]Posted at: October 18, 2006, 01:42:34 PM[/size][hr]feel free to add comments, anything you think will help me (not a bump)

item.title: Newby Alert!
item.dc:creator: @isair isair
item.description:
@isair wrote:

yes java and javascript is totally different you use javascript with html,java can create standalones…

2.yes it is,that is why there are ways of protection(fire walls they call them?Oh and routers protect your computer too but you must do a lil port routing for other ppl to connect to your server.And you have to get a static ip or a no-ip ip lol)

4.well erm here it goes(not minimum,recommended): 512mb ram/leave some space on hard disc so the program will run smoothly like minimum 100mb/512kbps internet connection/A video card that can run runescape smoothly well that is it.

Read full topic

Dude java and java s c r i p t are two totally different things

item.title: Newby Alert!
item.dc:creator: @D_A_N D A N
item.description:
@D_A_N wrote:

I dont know many answers but heres a few.

  1. Building can be quite difficult if you have no java knowledge. I suggest going through some tutorials before rushing into private servers.

3.Search this forum, theres bound to be one.

  1. Yes, keeping your server up and running. Good luck.

Lastly id like to say i respect you for not being a noob and running straight into private servers without background information. Cya.

Read full topic
